markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Water Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=1756)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 369 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target can walk on the surface of water and other liquids without falling through. It can go underwater if it wishes, but in that case it must [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) normally. This spell doesn't grant the ability to breathe underwater.

---
**Heightened (4th)** The spell's range increases to 30 feet, the duration increases to 1 hour, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
name: Water Walk

---

<summary>
Buoy a creature so it can walk on water.
</summary>
summary: Buoy a creature so it can walk on water.
